alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:46AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT GULF...SOUTHERN LIBERTY AND FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 330 AM EDT/230 AM CDT/... At 246 AM EDT/146 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Wewahitchka, or 18 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Franklin, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Royal Bluff, St George Island St Pk, Cape San Blas, Beverly, Overstreet, Poplar Camp, Kern, Simmons Bayou, Dalkeith, Saint Joe Beach, Fort Gadsden, and Nine Mile. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
